name: Hidden
description: Animated visibility helper with axis-aware size control.

use: you need to hide/show content with animation.

examples.minimal:
Hidden(
  hidden: isHidden,
  child: const Text('Toggle me'),
)

constructors: `HiddenTheme` — theme defaults for animation and axis.

accessibility: Avoid hiding focusable content without updating focus state.
dont: Hide content that is required for form submission.
